articles.title: FM Spokesman Urges Japan to Make Apology and Reparation
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Urges Japan to Make Apology and Reparation
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday released a statement on the occasion of the centenary of Japan's brigandish fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by force of arms and its illegal annexation of Korea.
					Unspeakable is human, material and mental damage done by the Japanese imperialists to the Korean people during the colonial rule, the statement said, citing data to prove it. 
					
					More than one million Koreans were killed, at least 8.4 million young and middle-aged Koreans were drafted to do slavery labor and hurled into shambles of wars of aggression and 200,000 Korean women were forced into horrible sexual slavery, it noted.
					
					There was a colonial era in human history but it does not know such country as Japan which enforced such harsh policy of obliterating other nation and plundering it as depriving the colonial nation of its spoken and written languages and people of their own names and looting even rice bowls and spoons of each house.
					
					The past one centenary is the history in which Japan has committed crimes but refused to redeem them and it is the history in which the Korean people suffered damage done by Japan and this touched off resentment at it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Had the present Japanese regime have nothing to do with the past militarist regime and had it not have any dream of reviving it, it might have repented and apologized to all victims for the past without any precondition and discrimination.
					
					Japan can never shirk its obligation to make apology and reparation to the DPRK for its crime-woven past. It should make immediate apology and reparation for the hideous crimes committed against the Korean people after usurping their national sovereignty through the fabrication of invalid "treaties". If it fails to do so, it can never be upright in the international community.
					
					Japan should honestly repent of all the acts it has perpetrated against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan after its defeat and immediately roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK. To do so is the least obligation to be fulfilled by Japan which had been under the cultural influence of Korea and it is the way of redeeming its crimes. 
					
					It should stop at once tampering with history and such moves to revive militarism as attempt to grab Tok Islets. Doing so is in favor of promoting lasting peace and stability in the region and Japan's security.

articles.title: KCNA Terms "Korea-Japan Annexation" State-sponsored Terrorism
articles.content:
KCNA Terms "Korea-Japan Annexation" State-sponsored Terrorism 
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released on Thursday an indictment "The 'Korea-Japan Annexation' is state terrorism perpetrated by the Japanese authorities" on the lapse of a century since Japan deprived Korea of its national sovereignty through "annexation".
					The indictment says:
					
					The "Korea-Japan Annexation" was state terrorism committed by the Japanese authorities against a sovereign state by use of government and military power. 
					
					Japan had made premeditated and systematic preparations to deprive Korea of national sovereignty for a long period of time.
					
					After the "Meiji Restoration" in 1868, Japan advocated the "Theory of Conquest of Korea" which called for "conquering Korea by force of arms for Japan's prosperity and the 'Imperial State,'" thus laying a political foundation for "Korea-Japan Annexation". 
					
					In the subsequent period Japan fabricated the "Ulsa Five-Point Treaty", the "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty," etc. to take hold of diplomatic right and the rights to administer internal and judicial affairs of the feudal government of Ri Dynasty, thereby turning Korea into its de facto colony and building a political and diplomatic foundation for "annexation". 
					
					In February 1906, Japan set up the "Residency-General" in Korea with the aim to push forward the "Korea-Japan Annexation" on the spot. 
					
					Japan got frantic in its efforts to lay a military foundation to meet the above-said purpose. 
					
					On the basis of these preparations the Japanese authorities held a Cabinet meeting in 1909 at which they made a brigandish decision which said: "It is the most definite method for displaying our ability on the Korean Peninsula to annex it and make it a part of the territory of the Imperial State." 
					
					At its Cabinet meeting held In July 1910 Japan finally confirmed the scenario for occupying Korea which called for depriving Korea of royal household right and completely seizing its territory. 
					
					According to this, Japan forced the "annexation" upon Korea and worked hard to completely eliminate its Emperor, the supreme representative of old Korea, from the political arena.
					
					In the "treaty", which Japan claimed to be a legal document on the "annexation", the Japanese authorities stipulated that "His Majesty the Emperor of Korea has completely and permanently transferred all the rights to govern the whole territory of Korea and His Majesty the Emperor of Japan has accepted the transfer of them from the former and approved the complete annexation of Korea to the Japanese Empire. As a result, the position and role of head of state of Korea became titular. 
					
					The executors of the Japanese policies in Korea made desperate efforts to dethrone the Emperor of Korea to reduce him to a commoner of Japan under the direction and wire-pulling of the authorities. 
					
					"Messages on the annexation of Korea sent and received," confidential messages exchanged between the "Residency-General" and the Japanese Cabinet as daily reports about the occupation of Korea, contained specific plots and strategies worked out by the Japanese authorities for the annexation. Most of them dealt with the issues of how to name Korea after the annexation and how to change the royal household. This is a clear testimony proving how persistently Japan tried to eliminate the supreme representative of old Korea. 
					
					Absolutely unpardonable was the arrogant and high-handed action taken by Japan to dethrone the Emperor of Korea so as to reduce him to a commoner of Japan.
					
					The suppression of the head of state of Korea was the most vivid manifestation of state terrorism. Because the suppression and insult to the head of state brought his people the unbearable sorrow of being members of a stateless nation and imposed upon them the destiny of national ruin. 
					
					The arch criminals who fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation" were the king of Japan and its government and military that acted by his orders and with his approvals. 
					
					The king and the prime minister of the Cabinet directly commanded and manipulated state terrorism for realization of the annexation and the military guaranteed it by force and high-handed actions.
					
					The south Korean paper Segye Ilbo dated August 13, 1993 in an article titled "Records documenting the whole aspect of Japan's occupation of Korea discovered" said: 
					
					"Particulars of Japan's annexation of Korea, a report of the Resident-General in Korea," is a crucial document confirming the fact that Terauchi did not handle single-handedly the issue of annexing Korea but it was directly commanded not only by the Cabinet but the Emperor of Japan. The document proves that the "the Residency-General' in Korea came directly under the Emperor on July 20, 1910 before Terauchi was posted in Korea and that he implemented the decision of the Cabinet as far as the name of Korea was concerned. The document makes it clear that the Japanese imperialists seized Korea under a carefully worked out plan from the outset, quite contrary to the assertion of the Japanese side that the Emperor of Korea entrusted sovereignty to Japan. Terauchi faithfully implemented the scenario of the Emperor and the Cabinet of Japan in the course of the annexation. 
					
					The "Korea-Japan annexation" was a direct product of the Japanese authorities' long-cherished ambition for aggression. 
					
					After the "Korea-Japan annexation" the Japanese reactionaries produced "commemorative postcard".
					
					The postcard carried "Song of Japan-Korea annexation" hailing the annexation, 2 000 years-old desire. It also carried "commemorative map" showing that the territory is bigger than that of Austria-Hungary and the population greater than that of Germany. The "map" marked Korea and Japan in the same color and edited on it was a picture of surroundings of Sungrye Gate over which a sun flag was seen.
					
					The "Monument to Japan-Korea Annexation" was erected in 1934 by the "Black Dragon Society", an ultra-right terrorist organization of Japan. Inscribed on its back side were letters "We have occupied Korea, a pending issue since the dawn of history".
					
					The "Korea-Japan annexation" was, in the true sense of the word, a hideous usurpation of sovereignty and the most outrageous state terrorism the Japanese government and military committed by mobilizing armed forces.
					
					The issue of the "Korea-Japan annexation", the state-sponsored crime committed by the Japanese authorities, should have been settled right after Japan's defeat.
					
					But Japan has not admitted the injustice of the "Korea-Japan annexation" but totally falsified the historical facts for 65 years. 
					
					The ruling and opposition parties and the academic circle of Japan are channeling main efforts into insisting on the "justice" of the annexation.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the Japanese rulers in recent statements issued on the centenary of the "Korea-Japan annexation" did not utter apology and reparation for the crimes committed against the DPRK and the Korean people in the past.
					
					Worse still, the Liberal Democratic Party in a statement said that the annexation was based on the assessment made under international law and Japan remains unchanged in its stand.
					
					In a nutshell, it is a very shameless act of trying to justify the annexation even in 2010 though it brought distress to the Korean nation after Japan seized its sovereignty in the last century.
					
					After inflicting tremendous damage on the Korean people through the hideous state terrorism unprecedented in history and the moves for obliterating the Korean nation, Japan blustered this time that it remains unchanged in its stand on the annexation. This is another politically-motivated hideous swindle.
					
					Such attitude of Japan is another unpardonable crime against the DPRK and the Korean people.
					
					The Japanese authorities are totally denying, distorting and whitewashing the 40-odd-year-long colonial rule over Korea while advocating the "justice" of the annexation. This is prompted by their wrong attitude to evade the settlement of its past crimes.
					
					It is foolish of the Japanese authorities to try to conceal the crime-woven history and dodge the settlement of their past wrongdoings.
					
					Japan, the assailant, has a legal and moral obligation to make honest apology and reparation for all the past crimes to the DPRK and the latter, the victim, has the right to wrest reparation from the former for all the damage done to it in the past on the principle recognized by international law and according to international usage.
					
					Japan's settlement of its past is its top priority task in settling the pending issues between the DPRK and Japan and herein lies the prospect for improving the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					The normalization of the DPRK-Japan relations is a matter that may allow Japan to evade it, but it is the historic responsibility and unavoidable legal duty of Japan to redeem its past crimes. 
					
					The Japanese authorities should recognize its state responsibility for the past crimes and make reparation for them under any circumstances.
					
					Japan's act of evading the settlement of its past is, in essence, a revelation of its ambition for reinvasion to repeat the crime-woven history and realize the old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" at any cost.
					
					The Japanese authorities remain unchanged in this ambition.
					
					All facts go to clearly prove that the Japanese militarists are dreaming of the second "Korea-Japan annexation" and seeking to realize the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" on its basis.
					
					If Japan tries to impose the second "Korea-Japan annexation" upon this land, the army and people of the DPRK will mount an all-round attack on the islands of Japan by mobilizing all the deterrent forces for self-defence and force it pay for all the crimes it committed against the Korean nation for centuries.

articles.title: Rev. Han Sang Ryol Crosses MDL
articles.content:
Rev. Han Sang Ryol Crosses MDL
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, reunification champion of south Korea, crossed the Military Demarcation Line via Panmunjom at 15:00 today.
					 Chairman An Kyong Ho and members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and officials concerned hugged him before bidding farewell to him.
					
					 People from all walks of life and youth and students in Kaesong warmly sent off Rev. Han at Panmunjom, waving bouquets and chanting in chorus slogans "National reunification" and "By our nation itself". 
					
					 As he crossed the line dividing Korea into the north and the south with a Korean Peninsula flag in his hand, plain-clothed agents handcuffed him and hastily took him away.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Bid Farewell to Rev. Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Bid Farewell to Rev. Han Sang Ryol
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in front of the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower this morning to bid farewell to Rev. Han, reunification champion of south Korea. 
					 Among those present there were An Kyong Ho, chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Kang Yong Sop, chairman of the Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea, and members of the north side committee and the north headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification.
					
					 An in his speech said that Han's visit to Pyongyang is warmly supported and encouraged by organizations at home and abroad and personages from all walks of life as it is a patriotic deed to demonstrate once again the patriotic faith and will of the fellow countrymen for reunification, promote national reconciliation and unity and make a breakthrough in the barrier of confrontation. 
					
					 Noting that the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas will accomplish the cause of national reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration, he said that the compatriots in the north would always stand by Rev. Han making his life worthwhile for the sake of the country and the nation, cherishing the will for reunification and patriotism. 
					
					 Han said in his speech that he met fellow countrymen in the north and heard their hearts beating, united close as one, witnessed miracles being wrought in the spirit of self-reliance and noticed their desire for peaceful reunification.  
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration is the only best medicine for healing the scars caused by the divided country, he noted, adding:
					
					 I do not feel lonely and fearful as I am joined by the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad and there is human conscience for me. I will wait and wait for our reunion in tears of joy. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting Han left for Panmunjom, holding the Korean Peninsula flag in his hand amid the warm farewell of the crowd.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Hungarian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Hungarian President
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Schmitt Pal, President of Hungary, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relation between the DPRK and Hungary would grow stronger.

articles.title: Prince of Liechtenstein Hopes Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Prince of Liechtenstein Hopes Peace on Korean Peninsula 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- I congratulate the Korean people on their successes in economic construction and the improvement of the standard of people's living and sincerely hope that everything would go well in the DPRK in the future, too.
					 Alois von und zu Liechtenstein, prince of the Principality of Liechtenstein, said this when meeting So Se Phyong, DPRK ambassador to his country, on Aug. 15.
					
					 He voiced expectation that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields and hoped that the work for peace on the Korean Peninsula would make progress.

articles.title: Diverse Events of KPA Held
articles.content:
Diverse Events of KPA Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The 19th art show, the 3rd pencil drawing festival and a calligraphic contest of the Korean People's Army were inaugurated at the April 25 House of Culture Thursday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of Supreme Commander       Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 Displayed in their venue are more than 680 art pieces of different kinds--Korean paintings, oil paintings, pencil drawings, pen paintings, calligraphic works, sculptures, etc.--created by military painters and servicepersons.  
					
					 Among them are excellent pieces praising the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il and depicting the servicepersons who are performing feats in defending the country and building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Present at the inaugural ceremony were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, servicepersons and art creators.

articles.title: Art Contest of GFTU Primary Organizations Held
articles.content:
Art Contest of GFTU Primary Organizations Held
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A national art contest of primary organizations of the General Federation of Trade Unions took place in Phyongsong, South Phyongan Province, from Aug. 17 to 19 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The contest brought together more than 300 members of the GFTU selected in different provinces.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers highly praising the undying exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by bringing about epoch-making changes on this land with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Narrative poem and song "Appearance of the DPRK", singing and story-telling "This Is Thanks to the Songun Politics of General", chorus "Oh, My Motherland of Songun", etc. mesmerized the audience as they reflected the ardent enthusiasm and firm faith of workers and members of the GFTU remaining true to the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Guidelines for Reunification Provided by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Guidelines for Reunification Provided by Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- In August Juche 79 (1990), President Kim Il Sung delivered an address to the participants in the Pan-National Rally. In the historic speech, titled "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country," he criticized the United States, Japan and separatists within the nation for obstructing Korean reunification.
					 He referred to such issues concerning national reunification as adhering to the three principles -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity --founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and forming a united front involving the entire nation.
					
					 His call for frustrating moves of the separatists within and without the nation and promoting the country's reunification with concerted efforts of the nation was also reflected in the June 15 north-south joint declaration and the October 4 declaration inspiring the Korean people to the struggle for the reunification.
					
					 The United States and its followers have stepped up new war preparations, rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity all the more acute. The fact clearly shows who are obstructing Korean reunification.
					
					 The south Korean people's struggle against the anti-reunification elements and for national unity strikingly demonstrates the validity of the President's policy of achieving the unity of the Korean nation based on the three principles of the reunification.
					
					 The Korean army and people will surely wipe out all the anti-reunification forces and build a reunified thriving nation on this land without fail just as he wished.

articles.title: US, S. Korea Continue Military Maneuvers
articles.content:
US, S. Korea Continue Military Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A tough-and-go situation has persisted on the Korean peninsula with the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime of south Korea stubbornly resorting to military threat against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 They kicked up joint military exercises, codenamed Ulji Freedom Guardian, on August 16.
					
					 Participating in the military exercises are more than 30,000 American servicepersons based in south Korea and other regions, some 56,000-strong forces of south Korea, at least 400,000 south Korean civilians and latest-type combat equipment, including nuclear strike means.
					
					 The commander of the south Korea-based U.S. forces revealed that the ongoing training was one of the largest joint staff directed theatre exercises in the world.
					
					 The training is viewed as the largest-ever nuclear war rehearsal in the scope of forces and means and in its content and character and the U.S. and south Korean warmongers are apparently going into action for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 From the beginning of the year they have waged war exercises against the DPRK under different pretexts.
					
					 They staged large-scale joint military maneuvers Key Resolve and Foal Eagle and joint naval exercises in March. In June, they whipped up war hysteria on the ground and the sea and in the air allegedly to cope with someone's intrusion and provocation after fabricating the warship "Cheonan" sinking incident.
					
					 They perpetrated a joint naval training in the East Sea of Korea in July and committed another large-sized joint drill in the West Sea of Korea in early August by mobilizing south Korean soldiers, sailors, pilots and marines, more than 4,500 in all, 29 warships including destroyers, submarines and patrol crafts, and over 50 fighters such as "F-15K" and "KF-16".
					
					 All the facts go to prove that the U.S. and the south Korean regime are warmanics wrecking peace and seeking a war on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: US Strategy for World Domination and Arms Buildup Blasted
articles.content:
US Strategy for World Domination and Arms Buildup Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The United States is running the whole gamut of means and methods to carry out its reactionary strategy for world domination. Its objective is to pressurize and contain its rivals and challengers by force of arms and seize hegemony. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. declared the "anti-terror war" under the pretext of the Sept. 11 incident and put Afghanistan under its occupation. It launched military invasion against Iraq on the basis of the false information about "its access to WMDs." It is branding Iran's nuclear activities for peaceful purposes as "the development of nukes" in a bid to internationalize it. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are attaching great importance to the Korean Peninsula in carrying out their strategy for world domination, in particular, while speeding up the expansion of NATO to the east and deployment of the missile defense system in Eastern Europe.
					
					 Arms buildup is one of the major levers of the U.S. for carrying out its strategy for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. is resorting to high-handed military actions to realize the above-said strategy. Its arms expansion is aimed to plug its rivals into the arms race and thus get them worn down. 
					
					 The U.S. is sparking off an arms race in the Asia-Pacific region, too. It keeps selling weapons to Taiwan. The U.S. is maintaining close military nexus with such allied forces as Japan and south Korea in a bid to tighten the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance and consolidate the sphere of its military domination over the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The U.S. stepped-up arms buildup, a factor of making the regional situation complicated, clearly indicates that the U.S. loud-mouthed "changes" are nothing but hypocrisy.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea in his "address made on August 15" whitewashed the treacherous, unpopular and anti-reunification policies which he has pursued since his seizure of power and disclosed his intention to step up them in the days ahead. This is nothing but his last-ditch effort to calm down the discontent of the people ready to go off anytime and create illusion about him in a bid to weather the daily deepening ruling crisis.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 His reckless remarks about "provocation of the north" and "changes" were aimed to justify his moves for war and confrontation with fellow countrymen by spreading false rumor that the warship was "sunk by the north".
					
					 What merits serious attention is that the traitor trumpeted about "peace community", "economic community" and "national community" presupposing "the north's dismantlement of its nukes". This is nothing but brigandish sophism intended to force the DPRK to disarm itself and realize his wild ambition to invade it with ease. 
					
					 His ballyhooing about "communities" presupposing "the north's dismantlement of its nukes" is no more than sleight of hand to create the impression that he is interested in peace and unification in an effort to mislead public opinion at home and abroad. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the traitor was so foolish as to spell out "unification tax" this time. 
					
					 If he has even an iota of true intention to avert a war, improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve unification, he should not talk about such "unification tax" but opt to respect and implement the north-south declarations.
					
					  What he seeks is to tide over his serious ruling crisis and escalate the moves for war and confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The desperate efforts of traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group to do harm to fellow countrymen will only trigger off bitterer rebuff and condemnation among the people and precipitate their own destruction.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted War Exercises Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted War Exercises Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The 32nd Division of the south Korean puppet army frantically staged what they called anti- chemical gas terror exercise in South Chungchong Province on August 19 as part of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					 The warmongers were busy with the war maneuvers in a coordinated operation with police and administrative and civilian organs under the pretext of coping with someone's "terrorism" including arson and explosion of chemical bombs.

articles.title: War Exercises Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
War Exercises Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- More than 40 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference outside the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" in Songnam, Kyonggi Province on August 16 at which they lashed out at the warmongers for staging reckless DPRK-targeted joint military exercises.
					 They branded the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises as war maneuvers apparently targeted against the DPRK in the light of their scale, contents, nature, etc.
					
					 The aggressive nature of the exercises is clearly proved by the fact that "OPLAN 5029" simulating "a contingency in the north" is expected to be put into practice and "Chungmu" exercises aimed at "occupation and control of the north" are to be carried out in parallel with the plan during the military exercises, they held.
					
					 The war exercises for aggression now under way under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case are escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, they deplored, denouncing the present regime for staging the saber-rattling together with the U.S.
					
					 They declared that they would wage a dynamic struggle to urge the Lee Myung Bak regime to roll back its anti-reunification policy and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Members of the North Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions, the North Jolla Provincial Committee of the Democratic Labor Party and the North Jolla Provincial League of the Federation of Peasants Associations also held a press conference outside the provincial office on the same day.
					
					 During the exercises they would hold press conferences and conduct information services across south Korea to demonstrate their will for peace against war, they declared.
					
					 Meanwhile, a demonstration was staged outside the Puchon City Office in protest against the war exercises.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Swimming against People's Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Swimming against People's Mindset
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Members of the second August 15 grand march group for reunification of south Korea held a press conference on August 14 at which they denounced the puppet regime for going against the mindset of the people.
					 A press release made public there recalled that the march group toured different areas including Seoul, Taegu, Kwangju and Pusan from July 30 to wage an all-people signature campaign for the probe into the truth behind the "Cheonan" case.
					
					 This period witnessed the mounting voices of the people demanding the Lee Myung Bak regime probe the truth behind the case without a shred of suspicion as early as possible, the press release noted, and went on:
					
					 The present regime, however, kicked off a vicious repressive campaign to blindfold people and stop their ears under the pretext of security, while fanning up a war atmosphere.
					
					 Expressing irrepressible indignation at the present regime, the press release urged the authorities to throw away the "results of investigation" faked up by the "joint investigation team" and conduct a comprehensive "inspection of state administration" to bring to light the truth of the case.
					
					 It also urged the authorities to opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration at an early date, stop the crackdown upon the people and make apology for their crimes.

articles.title: Moves to Revise Law on Teachers Union Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves to Revise Law on Teachers Union Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea held an extraordinary meeting of its deputies on August 14 at which it protested against the unjust moves of the puppet Ministry of Employment and Labor to revise the law on the teachers union.
					 Speakers at the meeting noted that the ministry pressurized the Teachers Union to revise its statute last April, charging that it is in violation of the present law on teachers union, and recently took some measures to deprive the discharged teachers of their union membership under that pretext.
					
					 The recent step taken by the ministry was prompted by its foolish calculation that no unionist would be willing to participate in the struggle for genuine education in case teachers are dismissed and deprived of their union membership for protesting against the "government's" unjust educational policy, they stated.
					
					 The Teachers Union will counter the ministry's moves with an all-out boycott movement, they declared.
					
					 In case the "government" escalates the crackdown upon the union after designating it as an "illegal organization", they will take more positive emergency measures, they warned.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Russia on Aug. 16 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					Displayed in its venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and books on their undying exploits.
					
					 Attending it were personages of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and popular masses.
					
					 Officials of the DPRK embassy in Moscow were present on invitation.
					
					 The 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation is a common holiday of not only the Korean people but Korean friends in Russia and the world progressives, speakers said, referring to the fact that Kim Il Sung led to victory the anti-Japanese war to crush the Japanese imperialists and achieve national liberation and freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 They noted:
					
					 Kim Il Sung built a democratic state of the people in Korea after its liberation and led to victory the Fatherland Liberation War against the aggression of the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces, thus successfully protecting the dignity of the country.
					
					 All the lines and policies of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are the just ones entirely in the interests of not only the Korean people but other peoples in the world.
					
					 The Korean people are making a dynamic advance toward a thriving nation undeterred by the repeated natural disasters and the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the speakers said, reiterating the invariable support for the struggle of the Korean people to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Establishing Socialist Cultured Practice in Life to Meet the Need of the Songun Era" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on August 13.
					 The work, published on February 10 and July 2, Juche 92 (2003), comprehensively deals with the importance of establishing cultured practice in life to meet the need of the Songun era and tasks and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Observed
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place in Guinea, a meeting in Switzerland and lectures and film shows in the Czech Republic and Indonesia between Aug. 12 and 14 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The participants in the film shows watched such Korean films as "Order No. 027."
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea at the seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" said that the self-defensive national capability of the DPRK has grown stronger and unprecedented eye-opening miracles are being wrought on all fronts to build a thriving nation, thanks to his Songun politics.
					
					 The factor which makes the Songun politics now in force in the DPRK fully display its might is that it is a perfect political mode under socialism, unanimously supported by the Korean people, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee in his speech at the meeting said that Kim Jong Il has put forward the army as the pillar in the national defence and socialist construction and enforced the Songun politics, thus frustrating the moves of the imperialists for aggression and turning the DPRK into a state that launched satellites and had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The victory the DPRK has gained in the confrontation over the recent "Cheonan" case clearly proved that only the Songun politics is the almighty treasured sword which safeguards socialism and the security and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Observed
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Observed
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Pakistani and Ecuadorian organizations issued bulletins on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification in the bulletin titled "Modern Korea and Songun" published on August 10 referred to the circumstances of the foundation of the Korean People's Army and its invincible might.
					
					 The bulletin noted that President Kim Il Sung took over two pistols as a revolutionary legacy from his father Kim Hyong Jik, formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union and unfolded the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Under the leadership of the President the revolutionaries of Korea waged the strenuous anti-Japanese armed struggle and finally defeated Japanese imperialism and liberated the country on August 15, 1945, the bulletin noted, adding:
					
					His idea on army-building and leadership mode have been successfully carried forward and steadily developed in depth by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The Songun idea and the Songun politics would have been unthinkable without Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the past and the present of socialist Korea without Songun.
					
					 The Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador in the bulletin titled "Day of Korea's Liberation" on August 12 noted that the DPRK turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, under the wise guidance of the President. 
					
					 A precondition for terminating the division of the Korean nation is to remove the political, economic and military obstacles lying in the way of the reunification by putting an end to the U.S. interference and getting the U.S. troops and all its military hardware including nuclear weapons withdrawn from south Korea, the bulletin said, voicing invariable support and solidarity for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 90 (2001) General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					 He was guided to a greenhouse built by the unit. Acquainting himself with the operation of the greenhouse, he expressed his satisfaction at vegetable farming well done under glass.
					
					 Seeing ripe tomatoes, he said it would be good to supply servicepersons with tomatoes cultivated in the greenhouse in winter.  
					
					 He then went round an education room, barracks, food and non-staple food stores of the unit. He appreciated the unit for good management of the economic life and called it "rich unit", underscoring the need to follow the example shown by the commanding officers of the unit in using their brains and striving hard for the improvement of the servicepersons' living.

articles.title: MINREX demanda indemnizacion de Japon
articles.content:
MINREX demanda indemnizacion de Japon
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo de que se cumplen cien anos desde que Japon anexo ilegalmente a Corea inventando de manera bandidesca a fuerza de bayonetas el "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 20 la declaracion.
					La nota senala que son incontables los danos humanos, materiales y espirituales causados al pueblo coreano por los imperialistas japoneses durante su dominacion colonial, y los argumenta con datos.
					
					   Mas de un millon de coreanos fueron asesinados, mas de 8 millones 400 mil jovenes y adultos fueron arrestados forzadamente y llevados a los trabajos esclavistas y a los escenarios de las guerras de agresion y 200 mil coreanas fueron sometidas a la terrible vida de esclava sexual, precisa la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Si bien hubo en la historia de la humanidad la era colonial, no ha existido un pais como Japon que practico la infame politica de exterminio nacional y saqueo con que arrebato hasta el idioma, la letra, el apellido y el nombre de la nacion colonial y le quito hasta la vasija de arroz y la cuchara de los hogares.
					
					  Para Japon, los cien anos pasados son la historia de crimenes y negativa a la liquidacion de estos y para el pueblo coreano, la de las perdidas sufridas por culpa de Japon y del odio acumulado a este.
					
					  Si el actual poder japones no tuviera nada que ver con el regimen militarista del pasado ni sonara con el resurgimiento de este, deberia reflexionar del pasado y pedir disculpas sin ninguna condicion ni discriminacion a todos los danados del poder militarista. 
					
					  Japon no podra eludir jamas la obligacion de pedir perdon e indemnizar a la RPDC sus multiples crimenes del pasado. 
					
					  El ha de pedir disculpas e indemnizar pronto sus archi-crimenes cometidos contra el pueblo coreano tras usurpar la soberania nacional de Corea inventando "tratados" fraudulentos.
					
					  Si no lo hace, no podra vivir dignamente en la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Tiene que reflexionar de manera sincera de todas sus acciones anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) perpetradas despues de su derrota y abandonar de inmediato su politica hostil a Corea.
					
					  Esto sera lo minimo de la obligacion moral que debe cumplir Japon, que vino viviendo bajo la influencia cultural de Corea, y la via para expiar sus crimenes. 
					
					  Japon debe parar ahora mismo sus maniobras para el resurgimiento del militarismo como la tergiversacion de la historia y el intento de usurpar el islote Tok. Esto contribuira al fomento de la paz y la estabilidad duraderas de la region y convendria a la seguridad propia de ese pais isleno.

articles.title: "Anexion de Corea a Japon" es el terrorismo de Estado de Japon
articles.content:
"Anexion de Corea a Japon" es el terrorismo de Estado de Japon
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- En ocasion del centenario de la "anexion de Corea a Japon" con que este pais isleno arrebato la soberania nacional de la primera, la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publico el dia 19 el acta de acusacion intitulada "'Anexion de Corea a Japon' es el terrorismo de Estado de Japon sin precedente".
					  La "anexion de Corea a Japon" fue el terrorismo de Estado cometido por las autoridades japonesas contra un Estado soberano movilizando todo el poder gubernamental y militar, comienza el acta y prosigue:
					
					  Japon se habia preparado durante largo tiempo y de manera premeditada y sistematica para arrebatar la soberania nacional de Corea.
					
					  Despues de la "renovacion de Meiji" de 1868, presento la "doctrina de conquista a Corea" que serviria de base politica de la "anexion". Esta doctrina establecia que "hay que ocupar por las armas a Corea con las fuerzas armadas por la prosperidad de Japon y Estado del 'emperador'".
					
					  Luego, al inventar el "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa" y el "Tratado Jongmi 7", tomo en su mano los poderes diplomatico, administrativo y judicial del gobierno feudal de la dinastia de los Ri.
					
					  De esta manera, convirtio a Corea en su colonia practicamente y sento la base politica y diplomatica para la "anexion".
					
					  En febrero de 1906, instalo en Corea la "regencia general" con el proposito de impulsar la "anexion" en el terreno.
					
					  Al mismo tiempo, se movio activamente para establecer el terreno militar.
					
					  Basandose en estos preparativos, las autoridades japonesas aprobaron en una reunion del gabinete sesionada en 1909 esta decision bandidesca: "Convertir a Corea en una parte del imperio japones mediante la anexion es el metodo mas seguro para hacer valer nuestra capacidad en la peninsula".
					
					  En la reunion del gabinete realizada en julio de 1910, se confirmo definitivamente el proyecto de ocupacion de Corea consistente en usurpar completamente el territorio coreano arrebatando los derechos de la familia imperial de Corea.
					
					  Segun ello, Japon impulso de manera forzada la "anexion de Corea a Japon" y maniobro desesperadamente para expulsar completamente del escenario politico al emperador coreano, maximo representante de la Corea de entonces.
					
					  Las autoridades japonesas anotaron, en un "tratado",  que segun ellas, es el "documento legal" de la "anexion", las siguientes frases: "Su Majestad emperador coreano concedio de manera completa y para siempre a Su Majestad emperador de Japon toda la autoridad de gobernacion sobre toda la extension de Corea" y "este ultimo acepto esta concesion y aprobo anexar completamente a Corea al imperio japones". De este modo, hicieron nominales la posicion y el papel del jefe de Estado de Corea.
					
					  Bajo el mando y control de las autoridades, los ejecutores materiales de la politica de anexion en el terreno maniobraron desesperadamente para abdicar al emperador coreano y convertirlo en un "ciudadano comun" de Japon.
					
					  En el "archivo sobre la anexion de Corea - remesa y recibo del telegrama", informe diario secreto de la ocupacion de Corea circulado entre la "Regencia general" y el gabinete de Japon, estan  compendiadas las conspiraciones e intrigas ideadas para el particular. La mayoria de ellas se centra en los problemas como la definicion del nombre de Corea y el cambio de la familia imperial de Corea despues de la anexion.
					
					  Esto es una prueba irrefutable de cuan obstinadas fueron  las maniobras de Japon para eliminar al soberano de la Corea de entonces.
					
					  No se puede tolerar nunca la arrogancia de Japon que convirtio al emperador coreano en un "ciudadano comun" de Japon expulsandolo de su trono.
					
					  La represion contra el jefe de Estado es precisamente la maxima expresion del terrorismo de Estado.
					
					  Es que la represion e insulto contra el soberano de un pais imponen al pueblo de este la desgracia y el destino de apatrida.
					
					  El promotor principal de la "anexion" es el rey japones, el gobierno y el circulo militar de este pais que actuaron a las ordenes y con la confirmacion de aquel.
					
					  El rey y el premier del gabinete de Japon mandaron y controlaron directamente ese terrorismo estatal y el circulo militar lo garantizo con la violencia y el despotismo.
					
					  En un articulo intitulado "Descubierto el documento que registra todos los detalles sobre la 'ocupacion de Corea por Japon'" publicado en su edicion del 13 de agosto de 1993, el periodico surcoreano "Segye Ilbo" senalo como sigue:
					
					"'Detalles sobre la anexion de Corea, informe del gobernador general de Corea', es un documento determinante que aclara el hecho de que la 'anexion de Corea a Japon' no fue ejecutada por Terauchi en persona sino fue dirigida directamente por el gabinete y el mismo emperador de Japon. Este documento comprueba que el 20 de julio de 1910, o sea, antes de que Terauchi fuera nombrado como gobernador de Corea, la 'regencia general' de Corea se hizo un aparato directamente subordinado al emperador y el problema del nombre estatal de Corea fue decidido segun la decision del gabinete de Japon. Revela tambien que los imperialistas japoneses ocuparon a Corea segun su plan trazado minuciosamente, a diferencia de la insistencia de la parte japonesa en que el emperador coreano ha confiado la soberania a Japon. En el proceso de la 'anexion de Corea a Japon', Terauchi ejecuto con exactitud el guion que le fue instruido por el emperador y el gabinete de Japon".
					
					   La "anexion de Corea a Japon" fue el producto directo de la historica "ambicion" de las autoridades japonesas de agredir a Corea.
					
					Despues de la anexion, los reaccionarios japoneses dieron a luz la "tarjeta postal conmemorativa" con las notas de una "cancion" que felicitaba la "anexion esperada" durante 2 mil anos. Ademas, publicaron un "mapa conmemorativo" que mostraba que por la "anexion", el territorio japones se hizo mas grande que el de Austria-Hungria, y su poblacion, mas que la de Alemania. En ese "mapa" Corea y Japon son anotados con el mismo color y aparece la foto del contorno de la Puerta Sungrye donde se flameaba la bandera de Japon. 
					
					En 1934, la "Sociedad de Dragon Negro", entidad de gangsteres ultraderechistas de Japon, auspicio la construccion del "monumento a la anexion de Corea a Japon" y anoto asi en su parte trasera: "Quedo solucionada la ocupacion de Corea, problema pendiente de la historia".
					
					La "anexion de Corea a Japon" es, al pie de la letra, la usurpacion de la soberania nacional y el terrorismo de Estado sin precedente.
					
					Este problema debio ser resuelto inmediatamente despues de la derrota de Japon en la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					Sin embargo, durante 65 anos, Japon no reconoce la injusticia de la "anexion de Corea a Japon" tergiversando totalmente los hechos historicos.
					
					Los partidos en el poder y de oposicion y el circulo cientifico de Japon juntan las fuerzas para insistir en la "necesidad absoluta" de la "anexion".
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que en sus declaraciones dedicadas con motivo del centenario de la "anexion de Corea a Japon", los gobernantes japoneses no hacen referencia alguna a la peticion de disculpas e indemnizacion de sus crimenes cometidos anteriormente contra la RPDC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					Para colmo, el Partido Democratico Liberal asevero en su nota que "no cambiara nada su posicion porque eso (anexion) fue evaluado en vista del derecho internacional".
					
					Esto es una actitud cinica para justificar hasta ahora, cuando pasaron los 10 anos del nuevo siglo, la "anexion de Corea a Japon".
					
					Es otro fraude politico de pesima calana que ese pais isleno, que causo enormes danos al pueblo coreano practicando el terrorismo de Estado nunca visto en la historia y maniobrando para exterminar a la nacion coreana, dijera esta vez de manera abierta que no cambiaria su posicion en cuanto a la "anexion".
					
					  Tal conducta de Japon significa otro imperdonable crimen contra la RPDC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas, al hablar de la "necesidad absoluta" de la "anexion de Corea a Japon", niegan y tergiversan totalmente y embellecen la dominacion colonial a Corea de mas de 40 anos partiendo de su injusta posicion de evadir la liquidacion del pasado criminal.
					
					Es muy estupido el intento de ellas de ocultar su historia criminal y eludir tal liquidacion.
					
					Japon culpable tiene el deber legal y moral de pedir disculpa e indemnizar sinceramente todos sus crimenes perpetrados en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano y la RPDC victima tiene el derecho legitimo a cobrar de Japon la recompensa de todos los danos segun los principios reconocidos de la ley internacional y las costumbres internacionales.
					
					La tarea mas prioritaria para la solucion del problema pendiente entre la RPDC y Japon tambien es la liquidacion del pasado, de la cual depende el mejoramiento de las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					La normalizacion de las relaciones interestatales entre los dos paises no es el problema importante. Pero, la liquidacion del pasado criminal es la responsabilidad historica y el deber legal que Japon no puede eludir ni posponer.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben reconocer la responsabilidad estatal y recompensar por sus multiples crimenes del pasado.
					
					La evasion de la liquidacion del pasado criminal por parte de Japon es, en su esencia, la manifestacion de su ambicion de reagresion para repetir el pasado de crimenes y realizar a toda costa su anejado e invariable sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					Todo esto muestra claramente que los militaristas japoneses suenan con la segunda "anexion de Corea a Japon" y tratan de establecer la "Esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" sonando con anexar a Corea.
					
					Si Japon pretende imponer la segunda "anexion de Corea", el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC golpearan totalmente a ese pais isleno movilizando todo el disuasivo para la autodefensa y ajustaran la cuenta final de todos los crimenes cometidos de siglo en siglo contra la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Mitin de despedida del pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
Mitin de despedida del pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 por la manana en la explanada del Monumento a las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria el mitin de despedida del pastor surcoreano pro-reunificacion Han Sang Ryol.
					Estuvieron presentes el presidente del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, An Kyong Ho, el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion de Cristianos de Corea, Kang Yong Sop, y los miembros del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					An Kyong Ho dijo en su discurso que la presente visita del pastor Han a Pyongyang esta apoyada fervorosamente por las entidades y las personalidades de distintos estratos dentro y fuera del pais porque es una conducta patriotica para manifestar una vez mas la conviccion y la voluntad patrioticas por la reunificacion guardadas en el corazon de la nacion coreana, promover la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y perforar la muralla de confrontacion.
					
					Todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar cumpliran la causa de reunificacion de la patria enarbolando la bandera del 15 de junio, afirmo y agrego que los habitantes del Norte estaran siempre al lado del pastor quien lleva una vida autentica por el pais y la nacion partiendo de su proposito patriotico de reunificar el pais. 
					
					El pastor Han asevero durante su uso de la palabra que cuando se reunio con los compatriotas nortenos, escucho los latidos de los corazones unidos como uno solo, vio los milagros hechos con la autoconfianza y sintio la ardiente aspiracion a la reunificacion pacifica. 
					
					La mejor receta para curar las heridas de la patria dividida es la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, subrayo.
					
					No siento ninguna soledad ni miedo porque me siguen los compatriotas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar y me apoya la conciencia de la humanidad, sentencio y recalco que esperaria con ansia el dia en que se encontraran otra vez llorando de alegria.
					
					Terminado el acto, el pastor Han partio hacia Phanmunjom siguiendo a la bandera de reunificacion y recibiendo el saludo de despedida de la muchedumbre.

articles.title: "Ulji Freedom Guardian" es para agredir a la RPDC
articles.content:
"Ulji Freedom Guardian" es para agredir a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Debido a los incesantes ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC de los belicistas norteamericanos y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, se da ahora en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion a punto de explosion.
					Desde el dia 16, ellos despliegan freneticamente el entrenamiento militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian".
					
					Fueron movilizados en esta maniobra mas de 30 mil efectivos norteamericanos estacionados en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar, mas de 56 mil uniformados surcoreanos, incluyendo las comandancias de cuerpo, la flota y la aviacion, y mas de 400 mil civiles y los ultramodernos armamentos de guerra como medios de ataque nuclear.
					
					El comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea dijo abiertamente que "Ulji Freedom Guardian" es uno de los ejercicios conjuntos mas grandes del mundo de los oficiales del estado mayor.
					
					La situacion muestra claramente que ese es el ejercicio de guerra nuclear sin precedente en la historia desde el punto de vista de los medios, la dimension de fuerzas, su contenido y caracter y que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos ya han entrado en la etapa de accion para pasar a la agresion militar crucial contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En el presente ano, los yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak vinieron desplegando las maniobras de guerra contra la RPDC de diferentes rotulos.
					
					En marzo pasado, libraron el ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve", "Aguilucho" y el entrenamiento maritimo conjunto en que fueron movilizados enormes efectivos.
					
					Bajo el pretexto del incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra surcoreano "Cheonan", desplegaron en junio ejercicios militares en la tierra, el mar y el cielo para hacer frente a la supuesta penetracion y provocacion de alguien. 
					
					Tras el entrenamiento conjunto maritimo efectuado en julio en el Mar Este de Corea, los titeres surcoreanos libraron unilateralmente a principios de este mes en el Mar Oeste de Corea el entrenamiento maritimo de gran envergadura en que fueron movilizados mas de 4 mil 500 efectivos de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas y aereas y la infanteria de marina del ejercito titere, 29 buques de diferentes tipos incluyendo el destructor, el submarino y el buque patrullero, y mas de 50 aviones de combate tales como "F-15K" y "KF-16".
					
					La realidad vuelve a demostrar claramente que EE.UU. y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak son belicistas que perturban la paz y buscan la guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena estrategia de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena estrategia de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos persigue la reaccionaria estrategia de dominio mundial y se vale de todos los medios y metodos para cumplirla con el proposito de ocupar la posicion hegemonica presionando y manteniendo a raya en lo militar a sus rivales y desafiadores.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 20 y continua:
					
					  EE.UU., que bajo el pretexto del incidente del 11 de septiembre proclamo la "guerra antiterrorista" y ocupo a Afganistan, lanzo la invasion armada contra Irak inventando el rumor de la "posesion de armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					  Ademas, califica de "desarrollo de las armas nucleares" las actividades nucleares de Iran con fines pacificos y trata de internacionalizar este tema.
					
					En particular, los imperialistas yanquis, que aceleran la ampliacion de la OTAN hacia el Este y el emplazamiento del sistema antimisiles en Europa Oriental, concede gran importancia a la Peninsula Coreana para realizar su estrategia de dominar el mundo.
					
					El aumento de gastos militares deviene uno de los medios importantes para el cumplimiento de dicha estrategia.
					
					  Es decir, mediante el incremento de gastos militares, el imperio pretende debilitar a sus rivales involucrandolos en la carrera armamentista que azota ahora la region de Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					  Efectivamente, el imperio sigue vendiendo las armas a Taiwan y estrecha mas las relaciones militares con Japon, el Sur de Corea y otros satelites.
					
					En particular, trata de consolidar su dominio militar sobre Asia-Pacifico al fortalecer la alianza tripartita con Japon y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  La complicada situacion regional demuestra claramente que no pasa de ser un embuste el "cambio" de que habla tanto ese imperio.
